description: Nowadays the demand for Frontend developers is higher than ever. Plenty of offers and interesting positions. So getting hired as a FED should be easy, right? The answer is that this is depending on the position you’re aiming for and what you’re bringing to the table. Different companies look for different profiles. We will map the talents currently looked for by the industry, as well as explore how you should navigate your career in order to become the go-to-guy (or gal) at your organization. By the end of the talk, you will know how to choose the right path in order to make yourself attractive in the job-dating world, so that head-hunters will be targeting you.
